remarks: The sum of the Möbius function multiplied by a non-principal Dirichlet character, divided by ` n ` , is bounded.  Equation 9.4.16 of [Shapiro], p. 379.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-May-2016.)
statement:
rpvmasum.z $e |- Z = ( Z/nZ ` N ) $.
rpvmasum.l $e |- L = ( ZRHom ` Z ) $.
rpvmasum.a $e |- ( ph -> N e. NN ) $.
dchrmusum.g $e |- G = ( DChr ` N ) $.
dchrmusum.d $e |- D = ( Base ` G ) $.
dchrmusum.1 $e |- .1. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
dchrmusum.b $e |- ( ph -> X e. D ) $.
dchrmusum.n1 $e |- ( ph -> X =/= .1. ) $.
dchrmusum.f $e |- F = ( a e. NN |-> ( ( X ` ( L ` a ) ) / a ) ) $.
dchrmusum.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. ( 0 [,) +oo ) ) $.
dchrmusum.t $e |- ( ph -> seq 1 ( + , F ) ~~> T ) $.
dchrmusum.2 $e |- ( ph -> A. y e. ( 1 [,) +oo ) ( abs ` ( ( seq 1 ( + , F ) ` ( |_ ` y ) ) - T ) ) <_ ( C / y ) ) $.
dchrmusumlem $p |- ( ph -> ( x e. RR+ |-> sum_ n e. ( 1 ... ( |_ ` x ) ) ( ( X ` ( L ` n ) ) x. ( ( mmu ` n ) / n ) ) ) e. O(1) ) $.
$d .1. n x y $.
$d C n x y $.
$d D n x y $.
$d F n x y $.
$d L a n x y $.
$d N n x y $.
$d T n x y $.
$d X a n x y $.
$d Z n x y $.
$d a x y $.
$d n ph x $.
$d n x $.
$d n x $.
$d n x $.
$d n x $.
$d n x $.
$d n x y $.
$d n x y $.
$d n x y $.
$d n y $.
$d x y $.
